medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric pain and right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started this morning after waking up, lasting for 1 day. The patient had liver for dinner the night prior and has not eaten anything for breakfast on the day of presentation. Denies fevers, chills, nausea, emesis, or diarrhea. History of constipation noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Celiac disease 2. Iron deficiency anemia and B12 deficiency 3. Osteopenia, osteoporosis 4. Depression/anxiety/sleep/EtOH 5. Basal cell/Melanoma 6. Status post TAH/BSO for endometrioid carcinoma 7. History of colon polyps, possible Lynch syndrome 8. Hyperlipidemia, on atorvastatin 80 mg daily 9. Right breast cancer, diagnosed previously 10. Alcohol abuse/abnormal LFTs 11. Soft tissue mass, right flank 12. Family/personal history of malignancy - possible Lynch syndrome 13. Melanoma 14. Type 2 diabetes on metformin 15. Recent infestation - bedbugs.
